definition: any of various predatory carnivorous canine mammals of North America and Eurasia that usually hunt in packs, eat hastily
details:
noun
- any of various predatory carnivorous canine mammals of North America and Eurasia that usually hunt in packs
- a cruelly rapacious person
= synonyms: beast
- a man who is aggressive in making amorous advances to women
= synonyms: masher, woman chaser, skirt chaser
verb
- eat hastily
= example: eat hastily
= synonyms: wolf down
